sentences.sentence: It was one of the driest and dustiest places in Africa.
sentences.translation: 这里是非洲最干旱、灰尘最多的地方之一。

sentences.sentence: Meanwhile in Europe, crops in the northwest are suffering the driest weather in the past 80 years.
sentences.translation: 与此同时，欧洲西北部的农作物正遭受着过去80年来最大的旱灾。

sentences.sentence: They are vital for sustaining life in some of the driest parts of the world.
sentences.translation: 它们对于在世界上一些最干旱的地区维持生命至关重要。
